wikitext.*:
:''Not to be confused with: '''[[Sunlending]]''', the [[Rohanese]] name of [[Anórien]]
'''Sunlands''' was a name in the [[Shire]] that referred to the far southern lands of [[Middle-earth]], roughly the same region as [[Harad]].<ref>[[Robert Foster]] (1978), ''[[The Complete Guide to Middle-earth]]'', p. 368</ref>

[[Samwise Gamgee]] heard tales of the [[Swertings]], [[Big Folk]] of the Sunlands who rode on [[oliphaunts]] when they fight.<ref>{{TT|IV3}}</ref>
